not-found: We can't find the requested data!
invalid-first-name: The first name must contain at least 3 alphabetic characters, and a maximum of 30 alphabetic characters
invalid-last-name: The last name must contain at least 3 alphabetic characters, and a maximum of 30 alphabetic characters
invalid-password: The password must contain at least 8 characters, 1 number, 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character
required-dateOfBirth: The date of birth is required
